entityType.description: From the [entityType codelist](#entitytype). What kind of entity is this? The 'registeredEntity' code covers any legal entity created through an act of official registration, usually resulting in an identifier being assigned to the entity. The 'legalEntity' code covers other bodies with distinct legal personality (government departments, international institutions etc.).
